textBox.richText: Artur stayed with the biometrics group at Idiap as a visitor for 3 months. Now he is back to Gradiant ( http://www.gradiant.org/en.html ) in Spain. Although the work is performed at Idiap is confidential for now this joint work will be mutually beneficial in the near future. On the behalf of all the members of the Biometrics team present on the photo as well as absent (represented by their surrogates) thank you. Adiós Artur !
Artur Costa-Pazo is leaving the team
